Articles.Content: I freaking love science strategies! I did 25% of my income gets converted and I'm getting sick science points. SICK.
Best update ever.
Woohoo!!!! I'm up to 24KB/s downloading KSP 0.25 now!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
WHEEEEEEEEE! Now, instead on landing on the top of the VAB, I can AIM at the top of the VAB! And that tunnel, the one which always crashes my planes? You're going DOWN.

I decided to run the patcher, but I don't think it cleaned up, or ensured ?I only got the right files, upon opening, I had just about two of everything in parts wise, in the VAB and Hangar.

I just deleted, but sine I cant connect tot eh server to download I'll now have to wait a bit. NBD....

Have patience. The Internet is not a truck. It's a series of tubes. The tubes where KSP is being hosted are pumping out bits as fast as they can.

A series of tubes, full of cats!

And the tubes that lead to multiplay.co.uk are little tiny tubes, called "dial up" or maybe "T3"/"Fast ethernet"/anything that says "wi-fi" in the title/two cans and a string.

Really? Well I don't play stock much so I guess I never noticed. In fact I've already given up on it, going back to NEAR.

Yeah, likewise, except FAR in my case, and after I finish the tech tree. (on Hard. Which isn't hard, it's more like.. 'moderate'..ish..in a sort of easy manner)

Stockosphere is .. so soupy.

Anyone else having issues where ships/kerbonauts won't get recovered in spite of hitting a variety of recovery buttons?

-Khorso

Try deleting your parts folder and then check the integrity of local files (Steam), or empty the parts folder and only add in the parts from the downloaded archive (store)

Worked, thanks guy!
Oif... having to pay to prototype the parts you research hurts.

That's on or end. Server butt kickage. Please be patient. Thanks.

You guys must've fixed it, because now I'm downloading it. And could you guys make a patch for mac users, because the pacher doesn't work. It just opens up terminal.

This thread is explained by the title.

1. When the astronaut complex is destroyed, there is a toilet that sits upon it's plumbing among the rubble.

2. You can use Whack-A-Kerbal from the Space Center screen.
14 hours remaining.. ;(

No, i seem to have the same problem. Graphic and Texture Settings are on high though, so o don't know why it's doing it. It seems not everybody has that problem.

I was having a problem with textures being all blurry as well, but restarting the game seemed to fix it.

Tried the new parts first... oh god iÃ‚Â´m in love!

And now IÃ‚Â´m going to blow some stuff up... and maybe start a new career. and then blow that up.

THX Squad for robbing me of my sleep.
Bug? I can't launch without breaking the runway.

Still downloading, only five hours to go. The question I have for the rest of you is this: if we had the Spaceplane+ mod in the previous game version, do we have to remake all of our craft again, or are the part names identical now that they're stock (which in theory should make old designs still viable)?

Anyone notice the stock parts are in a really low resolution? The formerly sharp red stripes on the LFB KR-1x2 are kinda fuzzy and pixelated in 1080p. Matter of fact, the only thing on them that has any sharpness is the flag insignia.
THEY LISTENED! In the Tracking Station Flags are disabled by default, just like Debris!
Anyone notice the initial drop on the runway will destroy the runway if the SP is too heavy?
Can you take out buildings with Whack a kerbal?

hitting Recovery after the capsule landed/watered worked fine for me in all cases
